nodes.text: When Jayko was running from Tan because he thought that he would hurt him, Tan finally caught up to Jayko and told him he wasn't going to hurt him because he got him famous, then he asked him to sign his book for his sister.

After AD-3 was done telling the story, Kelleran Beq asked a verbal question where anyone can answer. Master Beq asked them "Who did Tan want a signed copy of the book for?" Sage answered by saying Tan's sister which resulted in getting Blue Team got a fourth point.
